text: Lamine Kaba Sherif (born 27 January 1999) is a Guinean professional footballer who plays for EFL League One club Accrington Stanley as a midfielder. ==Club career== Kaba Sherif joined the Leicester City academy at under-10 level, and turned professional in 2017. He was released from Leicester in June 2019. Kaba Sherif joined Accrington Stanley on a two-year contract in July 2019. On 3 August 2019, he made his league debut for Accrington as a 79th minute substitute during a 2–0 defeat to Lincoln City. ==International career== In March 2019, Kaba Sherif received a callup from the Guinea under-23 team. ==References== Category:1999 births Category:Living people Category:Guinean footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Leicester City F.C. players Category:Accrington Stanley F.C. players Category:English Football League players Category:Guinean expatriate footballers Category:Guinean expatriate sportspeople in England Category:Expatriate footballers in England
title: Lamine Kaba Sherif
